GSD.product_version: versions from v4.15 to before v5.17.4
GSD.description:
mm: fix unexpected zeroed page mapping with zram swap

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.4 by commit afac4b88699a06c8b9369f9d759a1ec3c254b788, it was introduced in version v4.15 by commit 0bcac06f27d7528591c27ac2b093ccd71c5d0168. For more details please see the references link.
